notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Ke Yin wrote the initial manuscript and drew all the figures in this manuscript. Hanlie Hong led the analysis and took the photos of the section. Thomas Algeo, Gordon Jock Churchman and Zhaohui Li provided substantial comments and editorial revisions to the manuscript. Zongmin Zhu, Qian Fang, Lulu Zhao, Chaowen Wang, Kaipeng Ji, Weidong Lei, and Zhenggang Duan are responsible for the data analysis in this research.
